name: The Untitled Experment
description:
Up Arrow = Jump

Left/Right Arrows = Move

Down Arrow or Z Key = Wait

Press Enter and select "Palette" to switch between a few palettes and graphical styles

Palettes: Colored, Redscale, Funky Colors, LEDs, LCD, Monochrome (White on Black)

The game is a turn-based platformer, taking place on a grid of tiles. Keep moving to the right to reach the pipe and continue downward. In later levels, you will need to think ahead before acting.
